page.title: 15A child from the country.
page.content: I moved to Torquay on December 14th 1984.To start with the place seemed very large and unfriendly.As I had moved from Dartmoor where the Community was normally friendly the change was quite dramatic.After a few months I met people through school and started to go out.I soon realised that there were lots of places to go and different things to do.The people in Torquay are not the same as on The Moor.They seem more interesting which is probably because there was nothing for my old friends to do.The difference between the schools is very noticeable.In Torquay there is a higher level of discipline forced upon the children than on Dartmoor.There is also a choice of schools here while on The Moor there was only one.Tavistock Comprehensive is crowded with 2,000 children.Here there is less crowding.
